extendedInfo.description: The local news experience youâve been waiting for is finally here! WTRF is the premiere news leader for the Wheeling, W.Va. â Steubenville, Ohio area. Now you can get the latest news, sports and weather wherever you go with the WTRF Mobile Local News application. Mobile Local News brings the best of 7News straight to your mobile device. It makes viewing and sharing the news easy. With a few steps, you can get the latest news and share it with friends and family by e-mail, text message and even Twitter and Facebook. Whether itâs severe weather, the newest sports scores or breaking news, the WTRF Mobile Local News application keeps you in-the-know while youâre on-the-go. The new WTRF.com app includes: - Local news - West Virginia News - National News - Business News - West Virginia Tonight Live News - Decision Makers Stories - Local and National Sports News - WVU & OSU Sports News - StormTracker7 Weather Radar and Forecasts - Current conditions that change automatically based on your location. - School Closings and Delays and Severe Weather Alerts - Intuitive, patent-pending navigation - Submit your news pictures and videos to WTRF right from the app - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook - And moreâ¦ Designed and developed in partnership with DoApp, Inc., best in class in mobile phone development, and Inergize Digital, the media industryâs leading provider of content management solutions, Web sites and interactive technology for television stations and other media companies, the Mobile Local News application makes it easy for media companies to distribute news and information to the mobile masses.
